com.giift.formr

Interface IField

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ButtonChoice, CardNumber, Checkbox, Cvv, Date, Day, Dropdown, Email, Hidden, Month, Number, Onoff, Password, PersonName, Phone, PostalAddress, Separator, Slider, Text, TextArea, Url, Year, Zip

    public interface IField

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IField.SavedState
      This class is used by the Form Fields to save their state we store the value of the field and the Json config so that when there is change in instance state (e.g device orientation change) we can rebuild the form correctly
